about_the_game: Experience the immersive and atmospheric soundtrack from Pan'orama, featuring a collection of relaxing and chill tracks that perfectly capture the mood and tone of the game. Composed with the game's ambiance and tone in mind, the music blends seamlessly with the game's visuals and gameplay elements, further immersing you in its colorful hex world. Whether you want to unwind after a long day or set the mood for your next role-playing session, this soundtrack is a must-listen. So sit back, relax, and let the calming melodies transport you to another realm.
